name: mosaic gingerbread blanket
sizes_available: one size, more size details in notes
notes:
**free crochetalong fall 2024!** pattern is being released for free [on my ad-supported website][1] bit by bit from september 16-december 2. (full pattern available to purchase right away). 

purchasing the pattern will give you english instructions for both:
* overlay mosaic
* reversible using negative stitch

***spanish** version of the regular overlay mosaic crochet pattern is also included.*

create holiday magic with the **mosaic gingerbread blanket**—a festive crochet pattern featuring gingerbread men, houses, and candy canes. this overlay mosaic design adds a warm, cozy touch to your winter decor and can be crafted in the traditional method or made reversible using the negative stitch.
  
perfect for snuggling by the fire, this pattern is released weekly for free on the juniper & oakes website, with an option to purchase the full pdf. enhance your holiday decor or gift it to loved ones—this timeless blanket is a seasonal treasure you’ll cherish for years to come. 

[the pattern is also free on my ad-supported website, as a 12-week crochetalong with sections released week by week.][2]
& [purchasing the full pattern on my website will save you a couple dollars.][3]
  
get ready to embark on a crochet adventure with the mosaic gingerbread blanket pattern! this intermediate-level crochet throw pattern features a mesmerizing mosaic design that will captivate your imagination. crafted using 4000-5000 yards of knit picks' mighty stitch worsted weight yarn, this blanket showcases the perfect blend of softness and durability.
  
the pattern includes detailed written instructions, a photo tutorial, and a video tutorial to guide you through each step of the process. with a gauge of 18 stitches and 22 rows in a 4-inch mosaic swatch on the ws, you'll achieve a beautifully textured finish.
  
whether you're a seasoned crocheter or looking to expand your skills, this pattern offers a rewarding challenge that will result in a stunning rectangular blanket. customize the size to fit your preference and create a cozy masterpiece that will be cherished for years to come.
  
**unique features-**
\- intricate crochet mosaic design
\- detailed written, photo, and video tutorials
\- customizable size options
  
  
**materials needed-**
\- yarn: [knit picks mighty stitch worsted][4] (*yardage is for reversible pattern. will need approximately 25% less for regular overlay*)
• color a (cream) - 2325 yards/12 skeins
• color b (palomino) - 1290 yards/7 skeins
• color c (love letter) - 975 yards/5 skeins
\- crochet hook: size 4.0 mm (us size g/6)
\- stitch markers (optional)
\- yarn needle
\- scissors
\- [snips holder][5]
\- gauges:
18 stitches x 22 rows = 4 inches in mosaic swatch on the ws
18 stitches and 22 rows = 4 inches in mosaic swatch on the ws
